languages.text: Бесценная находка потрясла всю команду — на планете, умело сокрытый от взора авгуров, притаился древний имперский ковчег "Молот искупления". Если бы Вольный Торговец не отыскал{mf||а} части археотечного компаса, срезонировавшего с защитными системами судна, корабль так и продолжил бы лежать в бездонном ущелье, преданный незаслуженному забвению.

traits.locale_text: Бесценная находка потрясла всю команду — на планете, умело сокрытый от взора авгуров, притаился древний имперский ковчег "Молот искупления". Если бы Вольный Торговец не отыскал{mf||а} части археотечного компаса, срезонировавшего с защитными системами судна, корабль так и продолжил бы лежать в бездонном ущелье, преданный незаслуженному забвению.

languages.text: The priceless discovery left the crew speechless and shaken. The ancient Imperial ark ship, Hammer of Redemption, was hidden below the surface, impervious to the augurs' sight. Had the Rogue Trader not found pieces of an archeotech compass that resonated with the vessel's defence systems, it would have remained lying in a bottomless chasm, lost and undeservedly forgotten forever.
languages.original_text: Бесценная находка потрясла всю команду — на планете, умело сокрытый от взора авгуров, притаился древний имперский ковчег "Молот искупления". Если бы Вольный Торговец не отыскал{mf||а} части археотечного компаса, срезонировавшего с защитными системами судна, корабль так и продолжил бы лежать в бездонном ущелье, преданный незаслуженному забвению.

traits.locale_text: The priceless discovery left the crew speechless and shaken. The ancient imperial ark ship Hammer of Redemption was hidden below the surface, impervious to the augur sight. Had the Rogue Trader not found pieces of archeotech compass that resonated with the vessel's defence systems, it would remain lying in a bottomless chasm, lost and undeservedly forgotten forever.

Had the Rogue Trader not found pieces of an archeotech compass that resonated with the vessel's defence systems, it would have remained lying in a bottomless chasm, lost and undeservedly forgotten forever.

The priceless discovery left the crew speechless and shaken. The ancient Imperial ark ship, Hammer of Redemption, was hidden below the surface, impervious to the augurs' sight. Had the Rogue Trader not found pieces of an archeotech compass that resonated with the vessel's defence systems, it would have remained lying in a bottomless chasm, lost and undeservedly forgotten forever.

languages.text: 这样的无价发现，令全体船员目瞪口呆。古老的帝国方舟“救赎之锤”号就隐藏在水面之下，未被俄歇矩阵发现。如果不是因为行商浪人找到了这个远古科技罗盘的碎片，与飞船的防御系统产生共鸣，这艘飞船恐怕会一直默默躺在无底深渊之中，无人知晓，彻底被人遗忘。
languages.original_text: The priceless discovery left the crew speechless and shaken. The ancient Imperial ark ship, Hammer of Redemption, was hidden below the surface, impervious to the augurs' sight. Had the Rogue Trader not found pieces of an archeotech compass that resonated with the vessel's defence systems, it would have remained lying in a bottomless chasm, lost and undeservedly forgotten forever.

traits.locale_text: 这样的无价发现，令全体船员目瞪口呆。古老的帝国方舟“救赎之锤”号就隐藏在水面之下，未被俄歇矩阵发现。如果不是因为行商浪人找到了这个远古科技罗盘的碎片，与飞船的防御系统产生共鸣，这艘飞船恐怕会一直默默躺在无底深渊之中，无人知晓，彻底被人遗忘。

languages.text: この貴重な発見にクルーは言葉を失い、震え上がった。古代帝国の箱舟「贖罪の鉄槌」は地表下に隠されており、スキャナーの目には届かない。自由開拓者が船の防衛システムと共鳴する技術遺産のコンパスの破片を見つけなければ、それは底なしの裂け目に横たわったまま、永遠に忘れ去られたことだろう。
languages.original_text: The priceless discovery left the crew speechless and shaken. The ancient Imperial ark ship, Hammer of Redemption, was hidden below the surface, impervious to the augurs' sight. Had the Rogue Trader not found pieces of an archeotech compass that resonated with the vessel's defence systems, it would have remained lying in a bottomless chasm, lost and undeservedly forgotten forever.

traits.locale_text: この貴重な発見にクルーは言葉を失い、震え上がった。古代帝国の箱舟「贖罪の鉄槌」は地表下に隠されており、スキャナーの目には届かない。自由開拓者が船の防衛システムと共鳴する技術遺産のコンパスの破片を見つけなければ、それは底なしの裂け目に横たわったまま、永遠に忘れ去られたことだろう。

languages.text: El valiosísimo descubrimiento dejó a la tripulación sin habla y conmocionada. La antigua nave arca imperial, Martillo de Redención, estaba oculta bajo la superficie, invisible para los augures. Si {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente no hubiera encontrado piezas de una brújula de arqueotecnología que resonaban con los sistemas de defensa de la nave, habría permanecido oculta en un abismo sin fondo, perdida e inmerecidamente olvidada para siempre.
languages.original_text: The priceless discovery left the crew speechless and shaken. The ancient Imperial ark ship, Hammer of Redemption, was hidden below the surface, impervious to the augurs' sight. Had the Rogue Trader not found pieces of an archeotech compass that resonated with the vessel's defence systems, it would have remained lying in a bottomless chasm, lost and undeservedly forgotten forever.

traits.locale_text: El valiosísimo descubrimiento dejó a la tripulación sin habla y conmocionada. La antigua nave arca imperial, Martillo de Redención, estaba oculta bajo la superficie, invisible para los augures. Si {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente no hubiera encontrado piezas de una brújula arqueotecnológica que resonaban con los sistemas de defensa de la nave, habría permanecido oculta en un abismo sin fondo, perdida e inmerecidamente olvidada para siempre.

languages.text: Die unschätzbar wertvolle Entdeckung ließ die Crew sprachlos und erschüttert zurück. Die uralte imperiale Arche, Hammer der Erlösung, hatte unter der Oberfläche verborgen gelegen, von den Blicken der Auguren nicht zu entdecken. Hätte {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} nicht Teile eines Archäotech-Kompasses gefunden, die mit dem Verteidigungssystem des Schiffs resonierten, so hätte das Schiff weiter in einer tiefen Kluft gelegen, für immer verloren und vergessen.
languages.original_text: The priceless discovery left the crew speechless and shaken. The ancient Imperial ark ship, Hammer of Redemption, was hidden below the surface, impervious to the augurs' sight. Had the Rogue Trader not found pieces of an archeotech compass that resonated with the vessel's defence systems, it would have remained lying in a bottomless chasm, lost and undeservedly forgotten forever.

traits.locale_text: Die unschätzbar wertvolle Entdeckung ließ die Crew sprachlos und erschüttert zurück. Die uralte imperiale Arche, Hammer der Erlösung, hatte unter der Oberfläche verborgen gelegen, von den Blicken der Auguren nicht zu entdecken. Hätte {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} nicht Teile eines Archäotech-Kompasses gefunden, die mit dem Verteidigungssystem des Schiffs resonierten, so hätte das Schiff weiter in einer tiefen Kluft gelegen, für immer verloren und vergessen.

languages.text: Sans voix, l'équipage est bouleversé par cette découverte inestimable. L'ancien vaisseau-arche impérial baptisé « Marteau de la Rédemption » était caché sous la surface, en un lieu inaccessible au regard des augures. Si {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} n'avait pas trouvé les fragments d'une boussole archéotechnologique entrée en résonance avec ses systèmes de défense, il serait resté dans cet abîme insondable, à jamais perdu dans les limbes de l'espace.
languages.original_text: The priceless discovery left the crew speechless and shaken. The ancient Imperial ark ship, Hammer of Redemption, was hidden below the surface, impervious to the augurs' sight. Had the Rogue Trader not found pieces of an archeotech compass that resonated with the vessel's defence systems, it would have remained lying in a bottomless chasm, lost and undeservedly forgotten forever.

traits.locale_text: Sans voix, l'équipage est bouleversé par cette découverte inestimable. L'ancien vaisseau-arche impérial baptisé « Marteau de la Rédemption » était caché sous la surface, en un lieu inaccessible au regard des augures. Si {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} n'avait pas trouvé les fragments d'une boussole archéotechnologique entrée en résonance avec ses systèmes de défense, il serait resté dans cet abîme insondable, à jamais perdu dans les limbes de l'espace.

languages.text: Paha biçilemez keşif, mürettebatın nutkunun tutulmasına ve sarsılmasına neden oluyor. Kadim İmparatorluk ark gemisi Kefaret Çekici, alametlere görünmeyecek şekilde yüzeyin altında saklı bulunuyor. Hür Tacir geminin savunma sistemleriyle rezonansa giren arkeotek pusulanın parçalarını bulmasaydı gemi, dipsiz bir yarıkta kayıp hâlde yatmaya devam edecek ve sonsuza dek unutulup gidecekti.
languages.original_text: The priceless discovery left the crew speechless and shaken. The ancient Imperial ark ship, Hammer of Redemption, was hidden below the surface, impervious to the augurs' sight. Had the Rogue Trader not found pieces of an archeotech compass that resonated with the vessel's defence systems, it would have remained lying in a bottomless chasm, lost and undeservedly forgotten forever.
